text.autoconfig.apocalypsedrops.title: Apocalypse Drops
text.autoconfig.apocalypsedrops.option.e: If enabled, all the items below with a drop chance bigger than 0.0 will drop for Zombies
If enabled, all the items below with a drop chance bigger than 0.0 will drop for Husks
text.autoconfig.apocalypsedrops.option.g: Chance for Gunpowder to drop [default: 0.2] (20% drop chance)
Change this value to adjust the chance for Gunpowder to drop (0.0 = disabled, 1.0 = 100% drop chance)
text.autoconfig.apocalypsedrops.option.b: Chance for Bones to drop [default: 0.12] (12% drop chance)
Change this value to adjust the chance for Bones to drop, range: (0.0 = disabled, 1.0 = 100% drop chance)
text.autoconfig.apocalypsedrops.option.s: Chance for String to drop [default: 0.06] (6% drop chance)
Change this value to adjust the chance for String to drop, range: (0.0 = disabled, 1.0 = 100% drop chance)
Chance for Spider Eyes to drop [default: 0.03] (3% drop chance)
Change this value to adjust the chance for Spider Eyes to drop, range: (0.0 = disabled, 1.0 = 100% drop chance)
text.autoconfig.apocalypsedrops.option.p: Chance for Phantom Membranes to drop [default: 0.04] (4% drop chance)
Change this value to adjust the chance for Phantom Membranes to drop, range: (0.0 = disabled, 1.0 = 100% drop chance)
text.autoconfig.apocalypsedrops.option.e: Chance for Ender Pearls to drop [default: 0.02] (2% drop chance)
Change this value to adjust the chance for Ender Pearls to drop, range: (0.0 = disabled, 1.0 = 100% drop chance)
text.autoconfig.apocalypsedrops.option.p: Chance for Potatoes to drop [default: 0.01] (1% drop chance)
Change this value to adjust the chance for Potatoes to drop, range: (Note: 0.0 will not prevent Potatoes from dropping)
text.autoconfig.apocalypsedrops.option.c: Chance for Carrots to drop [default: 0.01] (1% drop chance)
Change this value to adjust the chance for Carrots to drop, range: (Note: 0.0 will not prevent Carrots from dropping)
text.autoconfig.apocalypsedrops.option.b: Chance for Blaze Rods to drop [default: 0.0] (0% drop chance)
Change this value to adjust the chance for Blaze Rods to drop, range: (0.0 = disabled, 1.0 = 100% drop chance)
text.autoconfig.apocalypsedrops.option.n: Chance for Nether Warts to drop [default: 0.0] (0% drop chance)
Change this value to adjust the chance for Nether Warts to drop, range: (0.0 = disabled, 1.0 = 100% drop chance)
